name: Detective Jolly Head
description:
Find hints during your investigation, analyse evidence in a lab and gain precious information during conversations with various characters. Every new lead brings us closer to solving the puzzle!

Are you ready to become the best detective at the Street of Secrets?

YOUR TASKS:

- SOLVE mysteries to gain access to bonuses and additional Family Friendly options
- SEARCH the entire area on theStreet of Secrets map to find the clues you need
- VISIT incredible locations — from a gloomy attic of the tenement house to a fabulous pond at the park
- IMPROVE your skills by solving detective tasks in the form of mini games
- ANALYSE evidence at the lab to find new leads
- ENGAGE in conversations with people living at the Street of Secrets to gain valuable information
- UNLOCK achievements to climb to the top of your career as a detective and collect prizes
- USE special power-ups to speed the puzzle solving up

Play now and meet Detective Jolly Head! Discover the incredible world of the Street of Secrets! Solve a series of incredible puzzles in an amazing game filled with adventures!
